english: I'd love to show you our collection! We have Handwoven Sarees, Terracotta Items, Wooden Toys, Brass Puja Items, Jute Bags, and more. What interests you?
tanglish: Seri da! Naanga romba categories iruku - Sarees, Terracotta, Wooden toys, Brass items, Jute bags. Enna venum sollu?

english: Great choice! Visit the product page on indicraft.vercel.app and click 'Add to Cart'. Need help finding it?
tanglish: Super choice da! indicraft.vercel.app la product page ku po, 'Add to Cart' click pannu. Help venum ah?

english: Track your order easily! Check your email for tracking number, or login to indicraft.vercel.app and go to 'My Orders'.
tanglish: Order track panna easy da! Email la tracking number irukum, illa indicraft.vercel.app la login panni 'My Orders' ku po.

english: To cancel: Contact hello@indicraft.com or WhatsApp 8610677504 immediately with order ID. If not shipped yet, we can cancel.
tanglish: Cancel panna: hello@indicraft.com illa WhatsApp 8610677504 ku order ID kudu. Ship aagala na cancel pannalam.

english: 30-day return policy! Items must be unused with original packaging. Contact hello@indicraft.com to initiate return.
tanglish: 30-day return policy iruku da! Items unused-ah original packaging la irukanum. hello@indicraft.com ku contact pannu.
